h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><blockquote>
<p>上一篇：<a href="https://juejin.cn/post/6999901807036071949" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/post/6999901807036071949">[图形学笔记系列] 实现一个简单的软光栅渲染效果-01</a></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">目标</h2>
<p>承接上篇，本章将完成从模型数据的原始坐标至屏幕坐标的转换。</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/54191771f45148448eb7fbbbf71f1528~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">实践部分</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">裁剪坐标系</h3>
<p>模型的原始数据经过模型变换、视图变换以及投影将转换为裁剪坐标系下的坐标，这里之所以叫裁剪坐标系是因为下面要进行齐次裁剪这个操作，就是把摄像机观察范围以外的部分删除掉，不要多想，在裁剪坐标系内的点坐标，此时还是齐次坐标系即<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>w</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(x,y,z,w)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span>。</p>
<p>关于坐标变换的相关内容我推荐这一篇文章：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fcloud.tencent.com%2Fdeveloper%2Farticle%2F1517668" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1517668" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WebGL简易教程(五)：图形变换(模型、视图、投影变换)</a>讲解的很清除，基本上跟着推导一遍就明白了。</p>
<p>当然也可以用<code>glMatrix</code>库中<code>mat4</code>的方法便捷的生成模型变换矩阵、视图变换矩阵以及投影变换矩阵。
<code>lookAt(out, eye, center, up)</code>方法生成视图变换矩阵，需要4个参数<code>out</code>为输出矩阵，<code>eye</code>为摄影机所在的世界坐标，<code>center</code>为摄影机所观察的位置，<code>up</code>为摄像机局部坐标系朝上的方向向量。<code>perspective(out, fovy, aspect, near, far)</code>方法生成透视投影变换矩阵，需要4个参数<code>fovy</code>垂直视角的弧度大小，<code>aspect</code>为近平面的宽高比，<code>near</code>为近平面距离摄影机坐标系原点的距离，<code>far</code>为远平面距离摄影机坐标系原点的距离，我这里用<code>Π/4, widht.height, 0.1, 100</code>看起来比较舒服，你可以改变一些参数值看看变成啥样。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> m = glMatrix.mat4.create()    <span class="hljs-comment">//模型变换矩阵，这里默认单位矩阵好了</span>
            glMatrix.mat4.fromYRotation(m, <span class="hljs-number">45</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment">//这里我要求点坐标围绕Y轴逆时针转45°</span>

            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> v = glMatrix.mat4.create()   <span class="hljs-comment">//创建视图矩阵</span>
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> eye = glMatrix.vec3.fromValues(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">4</span>)
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> center = glMatrix.vec3.fromValues(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> up = glMatrix.vec3.fromValues(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)
            glMatrix.mat4.lookAt(v, eye, center, up)  

            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> p = glMatrix.mat4.create()   <span class="hljs-comment">//透视投影矩阵</span>
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> fovy = <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.PI / <span class="hljs-number">4</span>
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> aspect = width / height
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> near = <span class="hljs-number">0.1</span>
            <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> far = <span class="hljs-number">100</span>
            glMatrix.mat4.perspective(p, fovy, aspect, near, far)

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>有了<code>m，v，p</code>变换矩阵就可以构造我们的顶点Shader了，因为在可编程渲染管线里顶点shader常用来做顶点位置的变换</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">        <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">verticeShader</span>(<span class="hljs-params">pt, m, v, p</span>) </span>&#123;  <span class="hljs-comment">//pt为一个顶点的xyz坐标</span>
          pt = glMatrix.vec4.fromValues(pt[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>], pt[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], pt[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);  <span class="hljs-comment">//转为齐次坐标</span>
          <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> mv = glMatrix.mat4.create();  <span class="hljs-comment">//世界坐标和摄影机坐标转换</span>
          glMatrix.mat4.mul(mv, v, m);
          <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> mvp = glMatrix.mat4.create();  <span class="hljs-comment">//再加上投影变换</span>
          glMatrix.mat4.mul(mvp, p, mv);

          <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> clip_position = glMatrix.vec4.create();
          glMatrix.vec4.transformMat4(clip_position, pt, mvp);
          <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> clip_position;
        &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>把顶点渲染出来，我们就可以得到如下图所示的结果(<code>drawPixel</code>的时候加了视口变换)：</p>
<p><img src="https://p1-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/11e4dda920f64056807fb9af2cba2858~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">齐次裁剪</h3>
<p>齐次裁剪我推荐看这一篇文章《<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fzhuanlan.zhihu.com%2Fp%2F102758967" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/102758967" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">一篇文章彻底弄懂齐次裁剪</a>》，讲的挺好的，但其实我实现的时候就用的简单的齐次裁剪方法，也就是要满足<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>w</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>w</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">-w \leq x,y,z \leq w</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.7719400000000001em;vertical-align:-0.13597em;"></span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.8304100000000001em;vertical-align:-0.19444em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.43056em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span></span>和<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>w</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">near \leq w \leq far</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.7719400000000001em;vertical-align:-0.13597em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="mord mathnormal">e</span><span class="mord mathnormal">a</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">r</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.7719400000000001em;vertical-align:-0.13597em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.8888799999999999em;vertical-align:-0.19444em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.10764em;">f</span><span class="mord mathnormal">a</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">r</span></span></span></span></span>这两个条件。其实很好理解，在透视投影矩阵推导的过程中，我们是将视锥体内的点压缩到一个<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>∗</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>∗</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">[-1, 1]*[-1, 1]*[-1,1]</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">[</span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mclose">]</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">∗</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">[</span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mclose">]</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">∗</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">[</span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mclose">]</span></span></span></span></span>这样的标准化立方体里，也就是说由齐次坐标转化为笛卡尔坐标系后的点坐标<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>w</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>w</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>w</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">[x/w, y/w, z/w, 1]</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">[</span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mclose">]</span></span></span></span></span>要满足该约束，也就可以推导出第一个条件。第二个条件是这样的推导的。还记得透视投影矩阵推导过程中<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>w</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">w</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.43056em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span></span>的值是什么?是<code>-Z</code>吧，<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mi>z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">|z|</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">∣</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mord">∣</span></span></span></span></span>这表示的几何意思是该点在未进行投影前到<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>x</mi><mtext>面</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">yOx面</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.8777699999999999em;vertical-align:-0.19444em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">O</span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">面</span></span></span></span></span>的距离，那么你要保证该点在视锥体内，也就是要在近平面和远平面之间，也就推导出了第二个条件。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-comment">//简单齐次裁剪函数, false为需要裁剪</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">clipSpaceCull</span>(<span class="hljs-params">pt, near, far</span>) </span>&#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> [x, y, z, w] = pt;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (w >= near && w <= far && x >= -w && x <= w && y >= -w && y <= w &&
          z >= -w && z <= w)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
    &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">NDC标准化设备坐标系</h3>
<p>标准化设备坐标系就是点坐标都为<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mi>w</mi></mfrac><mo separator="true">,</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>w</mi></mfrac><mo separator="true">,</mo><mfrac><mi>z</mi><mi>w</mi></mfrac><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(\frac&#123;x&#125;&#123;w&#125;,\frac&#123;y&#125;&#123;w&#125;,\frac&#123;z&#125;&#123;w&#125;,1)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1.095em;vertical-align:-0.345em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.695392em;"><span style="top:-2.6550000000000002em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span><span style="top:-3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width:0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top:-3.394em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">x</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.7475em;"><span style="top:-2.6550000000000002em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span><span style="top:-3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width:0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top:-3.446108em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.695392em;"><span style="top:-2.6550000000000002em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span><span style="top:-3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width:0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top:-3.394em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span>在一个<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>∗</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>∗</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">2*2*2</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.64444em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">∗</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.64444em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">∗</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.64444em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span></span></span></span></span>立方体中，且都满足<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">-1 \leq x,y,z \leq 1</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.78041em;vertical-align:-0.13597em;"></span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.8304100000000001em;vertical-align:-0.19444em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≤</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.64444em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span></span></span></span></span>条件的坐标系，经过齐次裁剪后裁剪坐标系内的点进行归一化处理使得<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>w</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">w</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.43056em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02691em;">w</span></span></span></span></span>值为1的过程称作透视除法，转换后的坐标也就成了标准化设备坐标系下的点坐标。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">              <span class="hljs-comment">//齐次裁剪</span>
             <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!clipSpaceCull(clip_position, near, far)) <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>

             <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> ndc_position = glMatrix.vec4.create()         <span class="hljs-comment">//透视除法，转化为标准坐标</span>
             glMatrix.vec4.scale(ndc_position, clip_position, <span class="hljs-number">1</span> / clip_position[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]) <span class="hljs-comment">//将w转换为1</span>

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">背面剔除</h3>
<p>关于面剔除我推荐这一篇文章<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fzhuanlan.zhihu.com%2Fp%2F95982245" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/95982245" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">从零开始的软渲染器（2）- 旋转木箱</a> 最后一部分有讲背面剔除，背面剔除其实是一个性能优化的过程，你可做可不做，如果要做呢，首先要明确你的正面是什么，在opengl接口这也都是可调的，自己写就测试一下就知道了，因为我自己测试的时候虽然你可以依照上述文章中的算法去做，但如果你改动一下数据存储的顺序结果就会受影响，然后明确你的观察方向就行了，我是这么做的。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">faceCulling</span>(<span class="hljs-params">pts</span>) </span>&#123;    <span class="hljs-comment">//这里pts为三角形面的三个顶点坐标</span>
      <span class="hljs-comment">//背面剔除, 返回fasle为需要被剔除</span>
      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> p0 = glMatrix.vec3.create();
      glMatrix.vec3.negate(p0, pts[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]);

      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> p0p1 = glMatrix.vec3.create();
      glMatrix.vec3.add(p0p1, pts[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], p0);

      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> p0p2 = glMatrix.vec3.create();
      glMatrix.vec3.add(p0p2, pts[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], p0);

      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> n = glMatrix.vec3.create();
      glMatrix.vec3.cross(n, p0p1, p0p2);
      glMatrix.vec3.normalize(n, n);

      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> glMatrix.vec3.dot(n, glMatrix.vec3.fromValues(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)) < <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ? <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> : <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
    &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">视口变换</h3>
<p>最后一个流程视口变换，就是把标准化设备坐标系下的坐标，转换成你最终渲染到视图上的坐标。关于视口变换我推荐这一篇文章《<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cnblogs.com%2Fgraphics%2Farchive%2F2009%2F10%2F13%2F1582773.html" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://www.cnblogs.com/graphics/archive/2009/10/13/1582773.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">DirectX视口变换矩阵详解</a>》</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">    <span class="hljs-comment">//视口变换，这里</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">viewPort</span>(<span class="hljs-params">pts, w, h</span>) </span>&#123;  <span class="hljs-comment">//这里有个坑嗷，glMatrix是左乘，文章里是右乘，注意，还有glMatrix是列优先。</span>
      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> viewTrans = glMatrix.mat4.fromValues(
          w / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, -h / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, w / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, h / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);

      <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> viewport_position = [];

      pts.forEach(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">el</span>) =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> pt = glMatrix.vec4.fromValues(el[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>], el[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], el[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> v_pt = glMatrix.vec4.create();

        glMatrix.vec4.transformMat4(v_pt, pt, viewTrans);

        v_pt = glMatrix.vec3.fromValues(v_pt[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>], v_pt[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>], v_pt[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>]);
        viewport_position.push(v_pt);
      &#125;);
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> viewport_position;
    &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">添加个旋转动画，看一下动起来的效果</h3>

<h3 data-id="heading-8">未完待续</h3></div>  
</div>
